sentence: Among the scheduled speakers Saturday is Loren Culp, the ex-cop and longtime Patriot? movement figure who not only badly lost in 2020 as the Republican gubernatorial candidate, but refused, Trump-like, to ever concede his election loss.

sentence: Trump endorsed 2020 GOP gubernatorial nominee Loren Culp, who refused to concede that race despite losing by 13.5 points to Democratic Gov.
title: New lines, interesting races in Washington state
